name: REWIND (itch) (Sleeprunner Studios)
description:
The void is consuming everything. You have to use your time rewind abilities to reach the great reset button.

Reach the top of the tower in time Rewind the time to make use of your environment Slow down time to get things across

... and don't get consumed by the ever expanding void!

REWIND is a contribution for the Mini Beans Jam and was made within 48 hours.

CONTROLS Keyboard WASDMoveMouseLook AroundSpaceJump ESlow MotionQRewind TimeFInteract   Controller (PC/XBOX) Left ThumbstickMoveRight ThumbstickLook AroundFace Button Bottom / AJumpRight TriggerSlow MotionLeft TriggerRewind TimeFace Button Left / XInteract A Game by
